long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn Mandarin Effortlessly with Zhong Cards!

No time to learn Mandarin? Zhong Cards makes it easy by showing a flashcard every time you open a new webpage.

Features:

- Seamless Learning: Practice Mandarin without interrupting your browsing.
- Daily Exposure: Consistent practice helps you remember new words.
- Customizable Levels: Adjust flashcard level to fit your needs.

Start learning Mandarin today with Zhong Cards, one flashcard at a time!
